name: Artem Shakun
aboutMe: I am a Frontend developer with two years of commercial experience. I am passionate about coding and, in my free time, I delve into learning new technologies. My main goal is to create efficient and aesthetically pleasing web applications, and my knowledge and experience enable me to achieve this goal. I believe in continuous improvement and am always ready to implement new ideas and technical solutions in my work.
subTitle: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.

project.title: Hunkemöller - German lingerie brand.
project.description: I worked on updates of the current website functionality and checkout automatization.

project.title: I can't mention the company of the name due to the NDA
project.description: I developed an analytic website and worked on fixing bugs and creating new charts, developed on pages for the mini-game Team Challenge for the American company and rebuilt the website that was created on the native JS, with JQuery, to React, which used the custom framework based on Next.js

portfolio.title: Countries
portfolio.description: This project provides information about all countries of the world using a party API service (https://restcountries.com/). The aim of this project was to study the work of Redux and ReduxToolkit in React. The idea itself was taken from the FrontendMentor website. Created in two copies written in Redux and rewritten in ReduxToolkit.

portfolio.title: Cards for finding vacancies
portfolio.description: This project is an information board consisting of cards of open vacancies. The purpose of this mini project was to study the work of Redux and ReduxToolkit in React. The idea itself was taken from the FrontendMentor website. Created in two copies written in Redux and rewritten in ReduxToolkit.

portfolio.title: Finder of GitHub users
portfolio.description: Using the GitHub API, this project provides functionality for searching GitHub users. This mini project aimed to learn how Typescript works in React.
